page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
{ INTRODUCTION}
This area is situated on the outskirts of the C.B.D, south of Hartlepool.In this area are the Fens Ward,Owton Manor Ward,Rift House Ward, Rossmere Ward and Seaton Carew.All the wards except for Rossmere are a nucleated clump of modern housing, gradually expanding towards Greatham. The two main land uses are housing and industry,Rossmere being part housing and industry.The industry lies between these wards and Seaton Carew,the A689 road separating the housing and industry.The main coastal railway from Stockton to Sunderland,seperates Seaton Carew and industry.In Seaton Carew new housing estates have begun to spring up,sandwiching the industry.
